details.purpose: Generates a script for submitting jobs to Slurm or LSF clusters, including resource allocation, profiling, and data compression.
features: Interactive user input for job configuration
Support for Cori (Haswell, KNL, and GPU) and Summit
Automatic selection of appropriate command lines for each cluster
Integration with HPCToolkit for performance profiling
Data compression using tar and xz
Option for email notification upon job completion
